page.title: 05LEISURE IN GREAT SAMPFORD
page.content: In Gt.Sampford there is a Woman's Institute, a Football Club, a Cricket Club(which is two hundred years old),the Brownies and the Girl Guides. For Cubs and Scouts you must journey to Thaxted or Ridgewell. There is a Badminton Club which held at the Lord Butler Leisure Centre.It is run by Andrew Wisbey,a boy who lives in the village.After that there is a session for the adults.There are many more things at the Lord Butler Leisure Centre which people from Gt.Sampford attend.Swimming and rollerskating are among them.There are a few things organised after school for us to do. There is a play area with a football pitch,climbing frame,swings and a slide.There is a riding stable in the village owned by Sarah Green.There are two public houses.
